name: Nanu
info: This kahuna works as a police officer in the Alola region. He appears lazy, but he is truly skilled in Pokémon battles and also deeply compassionate.

moves.name: Bite
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of making the target flinch.

moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Screech
moves.effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Just Warming Up...
moves.effect: Raises the user’s evasiveness by 2 stat ranks. Applies the Critical Hit Next effect to the user.

syncMove.name: Dark Authority Black Hole Eclipse
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases when the target is flinching.

passives.name: Critical Sting 1
passives.description: When critical hits land, raises the chance of making the target flinch, become confused, or become trapped with the additional effect of the attack.
